import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import PlainInput from "./plain-input.component" const plans = [ { id: 1, name: 'Small', sleeveLength: '58cm', bust: '82cm', waist: '70cm', hips: '92cm', length: '85cm', isCurrent: false, }, { id: 2, name: 'Medium', sleeveLength: '59cm', bust: '86cm', waist: '74cm', hips: '96cm', length: '86cm', }, { id: 3, name: 'Large', sleeveLength: '60cm', bust: '90cm', waist: '78cm', hips: '100cm', length: '87cm', }, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function SizingTable({ name, handleChange }) { const [sizes, setSizes] = useState({ Small: { sleeveLength: '58cm', bust: '82cm', waist: '70cm', hips: '92cm', length: '85cm', }, Medium: { sleeveLength: '59cm', bust: '86cm', waist: '74cm', hips: '96cm', length: '86cm', }, Large: { sleeveLength: '60cm', bust: '90cm', waist: '78cm', hips: '100cm', length: '87cm', }, }) function selectSize(e) { const { name, id, value } = e.target; setSizes(prevValues => ({ ...prevValues, [name]: { ...prevValues[name], [id]: value } })) } useEffect(() => { // handleChange({target: {name, value: sizes}}); console.log(sizes); }, [sizes]); return (
